|brand = ihiji |model = INV-APP |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -2100 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = network monitor |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Celeron;N2807; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- x86-64 Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.58 GHz<!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q64FWSIG; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = SO-DIMM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = ADATA;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Realtek;RTL8111F; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 24:1C:04
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Grub;0.97;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.32-504;Centos 6.6;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, mSATA, SATA II, USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 9-pin header,, populated |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI, RTC w/ battery, heat sink, metal case |addchip = 1K Serial FRAM Memory;Farnell;FM94C46A;;1;,,, 5.1 Channel HiDef Audio Codec;Realtek;ALC662;;1;,,, 4-port USB hub controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;2;,,, Environment Control - LPC I/O;ITE Tech Inc;IT8718F;;1;,,, Dual Operational Amplifier;Texas Instruments;LM358;;3;,,, 1+1 Voltage Regulator for IMVP-7/VR12 CPUs;Intersil;ISL95837;;1;,,, 5V/12V Single Synchronous Buck PWM Controller;Intersil;ISL6545;;2;,,, Dual Synchronous Buck Controller w/ 100mA LDO;uPI Micro;uP6182;;1;,,, 3A 23V Synchronous-Rectified Buck Converter;uPI Micro;uP1707P;;2;,,, 1A Low Dropout P+ Voltage Regulator;Taitron Components;LD1117A;;1;,,, 1.8A Sink/Source Bus Termination Regulator;RichPower;RP1210;;1;,,, 7.5A 30V Dual N-Channel Power MOSFET;OnSemi;NTMD4840N;;3;,,, 11.4A 30V P-Channel Power MOSFET;OnSemi;NTMS4177P;;2;,,, Multiple RS-232 Driver/Receiver;TI;GD72532;;2;,,, 1.5A Inverting Regulator;OnSemi;MC34063A;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = Habey USA |manuf_model = BIS-6628 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel Celeron]] N2807 Dual-Core (@1.58GHz) *Memory: 2GB DDR3L (SODIMM) RAM *Storage: 8MB CMOS Serial Flash, :8GB mSATA SSD, 1x SATA port *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet *USB: 1x USB 3.0, 3x USB 2.0 ports *PCI: 1x PCIe w/ USB Support *Power: 12V, 5A via barrel
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:ihiji INV-APP-2100 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:ihiji INV-APP-2100 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:ihiji INV-APP-2100 Internal.jpeg|Internal View </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
